item.title: How do u
item.dc:creator: @sethiedude sethiedude
item.description:
@sethiedude wrote:

its been posted b4 but it got removed so here
add this into client.java

public void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if (p != null) { client person = (client) p; if ((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("You have been all teleported to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }
right under

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

its at the beginning of client.java then go to commands and add this

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("alltome") && (playerRights >= 2)) //made by me { teleall(); //made by me }

pm me if i helped!

Read full topic

item.title: How do u
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

need to add this void

then add this command
if(copublic void teleall() { for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) { if(p != null) { client person = (client)p; if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) { person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel; person.sendMessage("Mass teleport to " + playerName); person.updateRequired = true; person.appearanceUpdateRequired = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } } } }
then add this command if(command.startsWith("teleall") && playerRights >= 2) { teleall() }

item.title: How do u
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

loop all players and teleport each one to the coordinates

like

for(client p : players){
			p.teleportToX = 3105 + r.nextInt(10);
			p.teleportToY = 3933 + r.nextInt(10);
		}

teleports em to 3105,3933 and a few random offsets added (so they don’t all teleport in one spot, but aound it).

Read full topic
